title: WiBit.Net Video Tutorial - Linux GUI C++ Project
description:
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ************************ WiBit.Net Video Tutorial ************************ */
/* ************************************************************************** */
Title          : Linux GUI C++ Project
Num Videos     : 19
Lesson Length  : 2 hours 10 minutes 52 seconds
Resolution     : 800 x 600
Codec Download : http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp
Date Recorded  : 5/21/2006
Narrator(s)    : Kevin Willett
OS:            : SuSE Linux 10.0
Software       : QT Designer, KDevelop
Description    : A project was assigned for an Operating Systems class in 
                 which we had to create some application that handled 
                 operating system duties. My group chose to create a Linux 
                 task management application, but none of us had any GUI 
                 experience in Linux. Over the course of the next few days I 
                 created these videos to show everyone a way to do it so that 
                 we could work independently. The test project is a simple GUI 
                 calculator that performs basic arithmetic. These videos start 
                 with nothing but a blank text document and ends with a fully 
                 functional calculator. Package and installation videos are 
                 also included. If you?re not a hard core coder these videos 
                 will bore you to tears! But there is some great information 
                 in there.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= Video List -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Video 1        : Software Installation
Video 2        : Looking At The Software
Video 3        : Coding The Calculator Class
Video 4        : Class Functions: Part 1
Video 5        : Class Functions: Part 2
Video 6        : Class Functions: Part 3
Video 7        : Class Functions: Part 4
Video 8        : Testing Our Code
Video 9        : Designing the GUI: Part 1
Video 10       : Designing the GUI: Part 2
Videl 11       : KDevelop: Part 1
Video 12       : KDevelop: Part 2 - Linking Number Buttons
Video 13       : KDevelop: Part 3
Video 14       : KDevelop: Part 4
Video 15       : KDevelop: Part 5
Video 16       : How To Install Our Program
Video 17       : How To Uninstall Our Program
Video 18       : How To Make RPM
Video 19       : How To Install RPM
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ***************************** About WiBit.Net **************************** */
/* ************************************************************************** */
WiBit was a website used by college students (and one professor) from Towson 
University in Baltimore, Maryland as a repository for learning materials. The
site creators were former Computer Science and Computer Security students, 
Kevin Willett and Bryan Stouffer. The first WiBit Tutorials were created by 
Kevin as a study aid for himself in late 2003. Over the following years Kevin
and Bryan decided to create a few tutorials and give themselves and their
fellow students a place to view and use them. Some were used as presentation
aids and students teaching students seminars. Over 30 tutorials were created!
The WiBit Tutorials served themselves well! All the students involved in the
project became professionals in their field of study. The creators Kevin and 
Bryan currently develop medical software. Others are working for great 
companies such as Bowing and Lockheed Martin. Since college the need to 
create tutorials has died down, but who knows what the future holds!
